title: The Villainess is Crown Prince’s Political Opponent - Novel Updates
tags: Broken Engagement   European Ambience   Female Protagonist   Oneshot   Otome Game   Reincarnated in a Game World   Villainess Noble Girls

description:
The woman who has reincarnated into the villainess of an Otome Game has been falsely charged and waited for execution.
At that time, the ghost of her mother appeared.>
